mapper.insert: insert into doll_ad_position (position_id, position_name, ad_width, ad_height, position_desc, is_open, position_style) values (#{positionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{positionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adWidth,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{adHeight,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{positionDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isOpen,jdbcType=BIT}, #{positionStyle,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update doll_ad_position set position_name = #{positionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ad_width = #{adWidth,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, ad_height = #{adHeight,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, position_desc = #{positionDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_open = #{isOpen,jdbcType=BIT}, position_style = #{positionStyle,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where position_id = #{positionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select position_id, position_name, ad_width, ad_height, position_desc, is_open, position_style from doll_ad_position
